description.left: Description of the donor self-reported gender. Gender is described as the assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles.

notes.left: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.
notes.right: betterTo prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

updated_submitter_donor_id.name: updated_submitter_donor_id
updated_submitter_donor_id.description: better Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

meta.notes: Edited this, To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

program_id.name: program_id
program_id.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

meta.notes: This is the unique id that is assigned to your program.  If you have logged into the platform, this is the Program Id that you see in the Program Services area. For example, TEST-CA is a Program ID.

submitter_donor_id.name: submitter_donor_id
submitter_donor_id.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

program_id.name: program_id
program_id.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

submitter_donor_id.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.
submitter_donor_id.name: submitter_donor_id

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

vital_status.description: Donor's last known state of living or deceased.
vital_status.name: vital_status

cause_of_death.description: Indicate the cause of a donor's death.
cause_of_death.name: cause_of_death

meta.notes: Cause of death is only required to be submitted if the donor's vital_status is Deceased.

survival_time.description: Interval of how long the donor has survived since primary diagnosis, in days.
survival_time.name: survival_time

meta.notes: Survival_time is only required to be submitted if the donor's vital_status is Deceased.

primary_site.name: primary_site
primary_site.description: The text term used to describe the primary site of disease, as categorized by the World Health Organization's (WHO) International Classification of Diseases for Oncology (ICD-O). This categorization groups cases into general categories.

cancer_type_prior_malignancy.description: The code to represent the cancer type of a prior malignancy using the WHO ICD-10 code (https://icd.who.int/browse10/2019/en) classification.
cancer_type_prior_malignancy.name: cancer_type_prior_malignancy

age_at_prior_malignancy.description: If donor has history of prior malignancy, indicate age at previous diagnosis, in years.
age_at_prior_malignancy.name: age_at_prior_malignancy

laterality_of_prior_malignancy.description: If donor has history of prior malignancy, indicate laterality of previous diagnosis. (Codelist reference: NCI CDE: 4122391)
laterality_of_prior_malignancy.name: laterality_of_prior_malignancy

height.description: Indicate the donor's height, in centimeters (cm).
height.name: height

weight.description: Indicate the donor's weight, in kilograms (kg).
weight.name: weight

bmi.description: Indicate the donor's Body Mass Index (BMI) in kg/mÂ².
bmi.name: bmi

menopause_status.description: Indicate the donor's menopause status at the time of primary diagnosis. (Codelist reference: NCI CDE ID: 2434914)
menopause_status.name: menopause_status

age_at_menarche.description: Indicate the donor's age of menarche, the first occurrence of menstruation.
age_at_menarche.name: age_at_menarche

number_of_pregnancies.description: Indicate the number of pregnancies a donor has had.
number_of_pregnancies.name: number_of_pregnancies

number_of_children.description: Indicate the number of children the donor has birthed.
number_of_children.name: number_of_children
